summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges for services rendered to NYSO LLC. It includes information about the sender, recipient, and specific charges associated with the shipments, as well as instructions for payment and adjustment requests.

persons.name: Lauren Kwintner
persons.context: Lauren Kwintner is identified as the sender associated with NYSO LLC, responsible for the shipping charges detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Craig Sergstron
persons.context: Craig Sergstron is mentioned as the recipient of one of the shipments listed in the invoice.

connections.description: Lauren Kwintner is associated with NYSO LLC as the sender of the shipments.
Craig Sergstron is the recipient of services provided by NYSO LLC, as indicated in the shipping details.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Pickup
events.description: FedEx picked up shipments from NYSO LLC on December 22, 2004.

events.title: FedEx Delivery
events.description: A shipment was delivered on December 27, 2004, as part of the services billed in the invoice.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-932-67997, dated December 31, 2004.
Total charges for the invoice amount to USD 13.60.
The sender, Lauren Kwintner, is associated with NYSO LLC.
The recipient of one of the shipments is Craig Sergstron.
Shipments were picked up on December 22, 2004, and delivered on December 27, 2004.
